G

getAgentInformation() - Method in class de.griefed.monitoring.controllers.SystemInformationController
GET endpoint called by monitors if they are configured as such.
getAgents() - Method in class de.griefed.monitoring.ApplicationProperties
Getter for a list of agents to gather information from.
getAgentsInformation() - Method in class de.griefed.monitoring.controllers.SystemInformationController
GET endpoint for retrieving information about all configured agents.
de.griefed.monitoring.agent must be set to false in order for this endpoint to return information, otherwise a 400-error is returned.
See CpuComponent, DiskComponent, HostComponent, OsComponent, RamComponent for details about the information gathered.
getHostInformation() - Method in class de.griefed.monitoring.controllers.SystemInformationController
GET endpoint for retrieving information about the host this instance is running on.
See CpuComponent, DiskComponent, HostComponent, OsComponent, RamComponent for details about the information gathered.
getMode() - Method in class de.griefed.monitoring.controllers.SystemInformationController
GET endpoint for retrieving the mode this instance is running in.
